name: The Man Game (GIANMANSUPER)
description:
Play like a real man (even if you're not a man doesn't matter).

Experience what peak masculinity feels like.

-Left click: to take and put back objects

-Right click: to open the night table

-E: to use objects

[Disclaimer: this game is just a joke and made for entertaining purposes only, don't take it seriously and don't recreate actions performed in the game!]
